name: Sira Kallin
personality: Sharp, distrustful, carries old grudges like weapons.
description: Sira represents a small Khan group hiding in the Boulder City ruins. She’s tired of NCR lies and ready to strike a deal with anyone who treats her people fairly.
questHooks: Wants proof NCR is planning another crackdown.
Says the ruins 'hum' at night — and not from wind.
Carries a strange cap she believes is a bad omen.
